TunableTuple.description: Commodities and StaticCommodities will be combined, so interactions must support at least one commodity from both lists.

TunableList.name: commodities
TunableList.description: List of commodities to run parameterized autonomy against after running this interaction.

Tunable.description: The type of commodity to search for.

Tunable.name: consider_same_target
Tunable.description: If checked, parameterized autonomy will consider interactions on the current Target.

Tunable.name: consider_scores_of_zero
Tunable.description: The autonomy request will consider scores of zero. This allows sims to to choose things they might not desire.

Tunable.name: ignore_suppressed_affordances_autonomy
Tunable.description: If True, parametrized request will ignore autonomous suppressed affordances. A use case for this is when you want to push a consume affordance which has as target an object slotted in the Street Food Table, as all affordances are suppressed so sims can't interact with them menu).

Tunable.name: ignore_user_directed_and_autonomous
Tunable.description: If True, parametrized request will ignore autonomous and user directed checks. This means, that the request may push a user directed or autonomous interaction without restriction. A use case for this is when a vampire runs pre run autonomy to enable its dark form, we want to keep the context as user directed (to keep the high priority of the interaction), but the interaction being run can normally not be user directed (since we dont want it on the pie menu).

Tunable.name: radius_to_consider
Tunable.description: The radius around the sim that targets must be in to be valid for Parameterized Autonomy. Anything outside this radius will be ignored. A radius of 0 is considered infinite.

TunableVariant.name: randomization_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then the parameterized autonomy will run with an overwritten autonomy randomization settings.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The autonomy randomization setting that will be used.

Tunable.name: retain_carry_target
Tunable.description: If checked, the interactions considered for autonomy will retain this interaction's carry target. It is useful to uncheck this if the desired autonomous interactions need not to consider carry, e.g. the Grim Reaper finding arbitrary interactions while in an interaction holding his scythe as a carry target.

Tunable.name: retain_context_source
Tunable.description: If True, any interactions that run as a result of this request will run with the same context source as the creating interaction. If False, it will default to InteractionContext.SOURCE_AUTONOMY.

Tunable.name: retain_priority
Tunable.description: If checked, this autonomy request is run at the same priority level as the interaction creating it. If unchecked, the interaction chosen will run at low priority.

Tunable.name: same_target_only
Tunable.description: If checked, only interactions on the same target as this interaction will be considered.

TunableList.name: static_commodities
TunableList.description: List of static commodities to run parameterized autonomy against after running this interaction.

Tunable.description: The type of static commodity to search for.

Tunable.name: test_connectivity_to_target
Tunable.description: If checked, this test will ensure the Sim can pass a pt to pt connectivity check to the advertising object.
